MainContent.emptyState: <bold>Select a source</bold> from the list to read messages, retrieve files, or send responses.
MainContent.emptyConversation: This conversation has no messages yet.
MainContent.pendingReplyTooltip: The reply is pending and will be sent to the source in the next sync

deleteDialog.warning: If you delete a source's account, they will no longer be able to sign in and send you messages. To communicate with this source in the future, they must create a new account.

single.message: Do you want to delete the source's account or just the conversation?

multiple.message: Do you want to delete these {{count}} source accounts or just the conversations?

username.label: Username
username.minLength: That username won't work. It should be at least 3 characters long.

passphrase.label: Passphrase
passphrase.invalidLength: That passphrase won't work. It should be between 14 and 128 characters long.

twoFactorCode.label: Two-Factor Code
twoFactorCode.invalidFormat: Your two-factor code must be exactly 6 digits.

network.header: Could not reach the SecureDrop server.
network.body: Please check your Internet and Tor connection and try again.

credentials.body: Please try again, and make sure to use a new two-factor code.

generic.body: Please check everything and try again.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session expired. Please log in again.

wizard.malwareWarning: This workstation lets you open files securely. If you open files on another computer, any embedded malware may spread to your computer or network. If you are unsure how to manage this risk, please print the file, or contact your administrator.
wizard.anonymityWarning: Files submitted by sources may contain information or hidden metadata that identifies who they are. To protect your sources, please consider redacting files before working with them on network-connected computers.
wizard.beCareful: Remember to be careful when working with files outside of your Workstation machine

exportWizard.title: Export File
exportWizard.understandRisks: Understand the risks before exporting files
exportWizard.insertUSBInstructions: Please insert one of the export drives provisioned specifically for the SecureDrop Workstation. If you're using a VeraCrypt drive, unlock it manually before proceeding.
exportWizard.exportSuccessWithWarning: Export successful, but drive was not locked
exportWizard.multiDeviceDetected: Too many USB drives detected; please insert one supported drive.
exportWizard.invalidDeviceDetected: Either the drive is not encrypted or there is something else wrong with it. If this is a VeraCrypt drive, please unlock it from within the sd-devices VM, then try again.
exportWizard.errorUnlockLuks: The passphrase provided did not work. Please try again.
exportWizard.errorUnlockGeneric: Failed to unlock the drive. Please try again.
exportWizard.errorExportCleanup: Files were exported successfully, but some temporary files remain on disk. Reboot to remove them.
exportWizard.errorUnmountVolumeBusy: Files were exported successfully, but the USB drive could not be unmounted.
exportWizard.errorMissingFiles: Files were moved or missing and could not be exported.
exportWizard.deviceError: Error encountered with this drive. See your administrator for help.

printWizard.title: Print File
printWizard.understandRisks: Understand the risks before printing files
printWizard.connectPrinterInstructions: Please connect a printer to continue. Once connected, click Retry to check for the printer again.
printWizard.errorPrinterNotFound: No printer found. Please check that a printer is connected and configured.
printWizard.errorPrint: An error occurred while printing the file.
printWizard.errorUnprintableType: This file type cannot be printed.
printWizard.errorMimetypeUnsupported: The file format is not supported for printing.
printWizard.errorMimetypeDiscovery: Could not determine the file type.
printWizard.errorUnknown: An unknown error occurred while printing.
